info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 20 at 5:29PM MST until August 20 at 7:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 529 PM MST, Heavy rain from storms earlier between Meadview and Valentine continue to cause runoff near Antares Road as well as Pierce Ferry Road. Flash flooding threat continues. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Valentine, Grand Canyon Ranch, Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads and Meadview. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
